member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1
member.summary: Describes the subresources from a resource that are accessible using a render-target view.

summary.para: A structure that specifies which buffer elements can be accessed.
A -typed value that specifies the data format.
A structure that specifies the subresources in a 1D texture that can be accessed.
A structure that specifies the subresources in a 1D texture array that can be accessed.
A structure that specifies the subresources in a 2D texture that can be accessed.
A structure that specifies the subresources in a 2D texture array that can be accessed.
A structure that specifies a single subresource because a multisampled 2D texture only contains one subresource.
A structure that specifies the subresources in a multisampled 2D texture array that can be accessed.
A structure that specifies subresources in a 3D texture that can be accessed.
A -typed value that specifies the resource type and how the render-target resource will be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1
member.summary: Describes the subresources from a resource that are accessible using a render-target view.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Format
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the data format.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.ViewDimension
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the resource type and how the render-target resource will be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Buffer
member.summary: A structure that specifies which buffer elements can be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Texture1D
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 1D texture that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Texture1DArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 1D texture array that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Texture2D
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 2D texture that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Texture2DArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 2D texture array that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Texture2DMS
member.summary: A structure that specifies a single subresource because a multisampled 2D texture only contains one subresource.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Texture2DMSArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a multisampled 2D texture array that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC1.Texture3D
member.summary: A structure that specifies subresources in a 3D texture that can be accessed.
